attributes.action: MAKE LAW, THE USE OF GREENWICH MEAN TIME, IN THE UK, THROUGHOUT THE YEAR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GMT is used as an international time standard so why is it that the country that thought of the idea does not use it thoughout the year?

rejection.details: Use of capitals throughout - difficult to read for many web users.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
